flavor_text:
[i]“Day 13. The illness shows no signs of abating. I only hope I can protect my new companion for as long as it chooses to stay.”
—a pilgrim's journal, found beside an empty pack of supplies[/i]
notes: the general idea is that the weasel infects the pilgrim with some kind of disease so it can follow and eat his stuff but the pilgrim doesn't realize it? maybe it's a bit too high concept and I should pick another angle but that's what I was going for
